results.title: Atenolol and chlorthalidone therapy for hypertension: a double-blind comparison.
results.text_hl: This study showed that one tablet per day of either @<m>CHEMICAL_atenolol_chlortalidone_drug_combinations</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C035884 @@@Tenoretic@@@ 50 or @<m>CHEMICAL_atenolol_chlortalidone_drug_combinations</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C035884 @@@Tenoretic@@@ 100 is effective and well tolerated in the treatment of mild to moderate @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Curry RC Jr, Schwartz KM, Urban PL. Atenolol and chlorthalidone therapy for hypertension: a double-blind comparison. South Med J. 1988 Nov;81(11):1401-6, 1411. PMID: 3055324
